description: This file defines a React component called NoteList that renders a list of notes with functionality for empty states and interactions such as edit and delete. It utilizes React's forwardRef for external control of the scrollable container.

methods.name: NoteList({ notes, onEdit, onDelete }, scrollRef)
methods.description: A React component that displays a responsive list of notes with empty state handling, supporting edit and delete actions, and forwarding refs for external control.

ctags.name: NoteList
ctags.pattern: /^const NoteList = forwardRef(function NoteList({ notes, onEdit, onDelete }, scrollRef) {$/
